entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
